abstract: Bertelsmann chief executive Harmut Ostrowski will step down at the end of the year; he will be succeeded by Thomas Rabe.
snippet: Hartmut Ostrowski cited “personal reasons” for the surprise move and will be succeeded by Thomas Rabe, the chief financial officer.
lead_paragraph: Hartmut Ostrowski cited “personal reasons” for the surprise move and will be succeeded by Thomas Rabe, the chief financial officer.

headline.main: Change of Command Set at European Media Group
headline.print_headline: Change of Command Set At European Media Group
headline.seo: Hartmut Ostrowski of Bertelsmann to Step Down
